ComicInfo.Penciller: George Roussos,Howard Purcell,Mort Meskin,Will Ely,Howard Purcell,George Roussos,Mort Meskin,Bill Ely
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Man Who Made Utopia: The mysterious Mr. Erutuf builds a futuristic city of houses for sale, but the people of Earth prove themselves unready for its scientific advances.
The Prisoners of the Paints: Struggling artist Warren Dale finds an old box of oil paints that magically allow him to paint a picture of a sorcerer who then steps out of the painting.
The Boy with the Super Powers!: Two strange men ask a farmer and his wife to take in a young boy, who is eventually revealed to be the heir to the throne of a faraway planet, in hiding from enemies who want to assume power.
The Menace of the Alien Test Tubes!: An alien missile comes to Earth containing four unknown chemicals in test-tubes which cause powerful and dangerous reactions, and serve as a warning to two scientists who have developed a miraculous invention of their own.
ComicInfo.Title: The Man Who Made Utopia; The Prisoners of the Paints; The Boy with the Super Powers!; The Menace of the Alien Test Tubes!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
